channel.title: Hmmm...difficult?very
channel.description:
tell me what i'm doing wrong theres this npc in the game that you can trade and nothing came up in his shop i added items there, so i know he works [code]spawn = 556 3217 3426 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Varrock Aubury at Magic shop[/code] works there i want him to work here x:3540 y:9891 here's his shop in my client.java(it IS under case 17) [code]} else if (NPCID == 556) { //Grum PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 17; //Port Sarim Jewelery Shop[/code]
any help ty

item.title: Hmmm...difficult?very
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

duh! 0’s!thx, i’ll try it
when i change their coords, it disconnects me upon trading him…
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 07:03:18 PM[/size][hr]all the npc’s work fine till i change their coords…how come when i change him to the coords i said, and trade him, he disconnected
but in his other spot, he works FINE

item.title: Hmmm...difficult?very
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

go to autospawn. then type in the npc you want it to be and type the coordinates of where you want him to be.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 06:44:49 PM[/size][hr]go to autospawn. press enter below one of the npcs. then type this

spawn = 556 3540 9891 0 0 0 0 0 1 Grum
